name: Mouse Cursor
description: Displays a custom image under your mouse pointer.

changelog.2.3.0: 2025-03-01: Upgraded to Blish 1.2.0, added action cam, left click drag support and loading, dialog, and character screen detection
changelog.2.2.0: 2022-01-20: Added option for Mouse during Combat
changelog.2.1.4: 2021-10-15: Upgraded to Blish 0.11.1, fix size on color picker for 11.2
